title: Quora Cracks Down on Anonymous Users

For the uninitiated, Quora is a website where some people ask questions, and other people answer them. Yes, it is a little like Yahoo Answers, but the quality of the questions and answers published on Quora is a little higher than those published on Yahoo Answers. Just.
